question: Which countries form the habitat range of "Goliath Frog"?
explanation: Goliath Frog, also known as goliath bullfrog or giant slippery frog, is the largest living frog on Earth. This frog is an endangered species, according to the IUCN's Red List of Threatened Species. Cameroon and Equatorial Guinea form the habitat range of Goliath frog. Habitat destructions, food and pet trade pose major reasons for the drastic population decline of the Goliath frog.
